column1: #text=It 's been a while since I have taken a bath , I usually shower .
#text=When I do bathe , I tend to make a big deal of it , with bubble bath or bath oil , and book to read in the tub , and very hot water .
#text=Some bubble bath comes in carnation fragrance , and sometimes I have a packet in one of the bathroom drawers .
#text=If I have one , I put in the bathtub plug and open the packet and empty it under the bath tap .
#text=I turn on only the hot water , because at my house it starts out cold and only gradually heats up .
#text=I do test the temperature on my arm and adjust it as the tub fills .
#text=I get fresh clothes and put them on the counter .
#text=I also get an old paperback book , and put it by the tub .
#text=Finally I undress , and usually put the clothes I 'm taking off in the hamper .
#text=I do all this rather slowly , because the tub fills so slowly .
#text=I climb in carefully , and again slowly , because the water is so hot .
#text=I slither down in the tub , so I am buried in suds .
#text=Then I pick up my book and start to read .
#text=Chances are , unless I 'm really grubby I wont scrub until the bubbles start to diminish , if then .
#text=I just let the heat soak into me .
#text=Finally I wash , emphasizing body folds , using just bar soap , no washcloth .
#text=I drain the bath tub and stand up , and sometimes I 'll shower quickly to refresh myself , because I 'm so relaxed I could fall asleep where I stand .
#text=I climb onto the mat and get dressed , usually ready for bed .
